summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1996 DAMON CHALLENGER RV.  WHEN ENTERING THE VEHICLE, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE DRIVER'S SIDE WALL WAS WET.  HE COULD ALMOST PUSH HIS ARM THROUGH THE PLYWOOD ON THE WALL.  HE ALSO NOTICED THAT THE VEHICLE DID NOT HAVE A LEAK DETECTOR FOR THE LP GAS INSTALLED IN THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, BUT THEY REFUSED TO INSPECT THE VEHICLE OR MAKE ANY REPAIRS.  THE CONTACT IS IN THE PROCESS OF NOTIFYING THE MANUFACTURER.  THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 18,000.
